cc_text.paragraph: There are about 4 ways to customize search results to change how they are displayed in the Data Grid:

The demonstration below describes the steps for customizing search results by using the Sorting by Column and Rearrange Columns methods. The other two methods will be discussed in a later module. Select Play to view the demonstration.
To sort by column, select any column name to sort search results by that column.
Click the Property Number column. The properties are displayed by ascending number. That means they are arranged from the smallest to the largest property number.
Click the Property Number column again. The properties are displayed by descending number. That means they are arranged from the largest to the smallest property number.
To rearrange columns, select a column name and drag the column to a new location.
Click the Status column and drag it to the right of the Property Name column.
The Status column is now located to the right of the Property Name column.
